FiOS WiFi Calculator

This program can calculate defualt passwords of FiOS routers from the name of the wireless network.

About

  • How can I identify FiOS WiFi?

    They can be identified by the structure of their name. They are always five digits long and usually consist of random numbers and letters; example: "M3OV6" or "E3X12".

  • Why are there two passwords generated?

    Because of the way they created the passwords there will always be two possible passwords. One of which will be the correct one you are looking for, so try both.

  • Why can't I connect using the calculated passwords?

    First make sure you've typed everything in correctly zero's may look like O's, ones like L's, and so on. Copy and paste calculated passwords to avoid miss types.

  • I typed it in right what's wrong?

    There could be a few issues. Either your not connecting to a factory FiOS router, the default password has been changed, or it is a third generation router. Third generation routers use a different algorithm, rendering this application useless.

  • This app is acting weird!

    Please send all your bugs and concerns to support.fioswificalculator@buchea.com
